# 8.0 Docs

## Networking

- [SendFile throws NotSupportedException for connectionless sockets](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/networking/8.0/sendfile-connectionless.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in networking where the SendFile, SendFileAsync, and EndSendFile methods now throw a NotSupportedException for connectionless sockets on all platforms.
- [User info in `mailto:` URIs is compared](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/networking/8.0/uri-comparison.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in networking where URI comparison now considers user info for `mailto:` URIs.
